title: Counterspell
content:
3 - 8d6 damage requires Counterspell Level 3. Fireball, Level 3 - 10d6 damage requires Counterspell Level 5. Polymorph, Level 4 requires Counterspell Level 4. (Note: There's no way to know if this was upscaled)

Upscaled none-damaging spells are very rare and sometimes scripted for certain special battles, in some cases it is impossible to figure out the exact spell level and there's some fights where they will cast an upscaled Level 1 none-damaging spell that cannot be countered by level 3, the
